name: Liz Rutledge and Dr Cyrina Bullard
offering: 9/21/2025mily, Communication Training, Online Education for Business Owners, Public Speaking
what_you_do: Cyrina Bullard and Liz Rutledge partnered in 2019 to create in-person wellness workshops. They had to pivot when the pandemic hit and now do business as Sustainable Happiness Together with a collection of online wellness courses.
who_you_serve: They work virtually (and in person when possible) with organizations, corporations, and school districts to provide transformative wellness education and coaching.
social_proof: Cyrina is certified in the Science of Happiness by UC Berkeley, in the Science of Wellbeing by Yale University, in Resilience by HeartMath®, in Conversational Intelligence®, and is a Life Mastery Consultant. Liz is formally trained by Mindful Schools.
business_focus: Providing transformative wellness education and coaching.
service_provided: wellness courses, wellness education, wellness coaching
